name: project-hub
title: Project Hub
description: Quickly access all your project-related links from one place.
author: rodrigoarias

commands.name: manage-projects
commands.title: Manage Projects
commands.subtitle: Project Hub
commands.description: Create, edit, and organize your project links and resources in a centralized hub.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
